Privacy Policy

Last updated: 30 October 2025

Who we are

Focus Foto — Ophelia Zimmermann, Zurich, Switzerland. Contact: you@example.com.

What data we collect
  • Contact details you share (name, email, message, shoot details).
  • Files you provide (mood boards, reference images).
  • Basic visit data from GitHub Pages (technical logs). We do not run analytics cookies.
How we use your data
  • To respond to enquiries and plan shoots.
  • To deliver and manage galleries and invoices.
  • To comply with legal obligations (e.g., tax records).
Sharing

We don’t sell your data. We may share it with service providers we use to deliver our work (e.g., gallery delivery, payment services) under adequate data protection safeguards.

Storage & retention

We keep enquiry emails and project files for as long as needed to provide the service and for legal record-keeping. You can request deletion where applicable.

Your rights

You may request access, correction, or deletion of your personal data. Contact you@example.com.

Cookies

This site is a static site hosted on GitHub Pages. We don’t set tracking cookies. GitHub may collect basic technical data to operate the service.

Contact

For privacy questions, email you@example.com.

This is a general template and not legal advice. For specific needs under Swiss data protection law, consult a professional.
